text: 2 Future 4 U is the third studio album by American record producer Armand Van Helden. It was released on the 30th of November ,1998, by Tinted and includes the singles "U Don't Know Me" and "Flowerz". ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! title: 2 Future 4 U
